answers.answer: Unfortunately I scored too high on mine so I had to do the 3hr test and was diagnosed with Gestational Diabetes :( great thing is I didn't require medication (guess I wasn't that bad). I had to see a nutritionist for a low carb diet and check my blood sugar few times a day and do NST and scans each week. I'm 5 weeks in the diet program and baby and I are doing perfect. He passes everything and is growing well. I'm 38w now:) hoping all goes well with you :)

question: Hello ladies, I had my glucose test fine today and it came out at 175, scary!!! Hoping my next test is normal. Anybody gone through this?
title: glucose test
